channel.title: 317 (PI) Interface comes up for new players!
channel.description:
I want to make a rules interface that pops up in the center of the screen when a new player firsts logs in. I have already got the interface ids but i just need to know how to do it.
Thxxx
And btw move if in wrong section :) thanks.
